name: TaoofChrist
0:
”Alexa, open tao of christ”
”Alexa, ask tao of christ for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start tao of christ”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tao of christ
des: Listen to the latest episodes from Marshall Davis' podcast "The Tao of Christ." You access this by saying, "Alexa, open tao of christ" or "Alexa, ask tao of christ for the latest talk" or "Alexa, start tao of christ." You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
